meta.name: description
meta.content: At Queen Creek Unified School District in Queen Creek, AZ, we are committed to excellence through leadership. Visit our website or give us a call today!

section.a: To assist with reading PDF documents on this website, visit our Website Accessibility page for information on downloading Adobe Reader.

div.div: Middle School Athletic Director of the Year

div.p: Our own Carl Holgerson has been named the Middle School Athletic Director (AD) of the Year by the Arizona Interscholastic Athletic Administrators Association (AIAAA)!

a.aria-label: Middle School Athletic Director of the Year news article

div.p: Both breakfast and lunch are available on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday from 10:00 a.m. to noon.

a.aria-label: School Closure Meal Service Update news article

div.p: The Queen Creek Unified School District is in close contact with state and county health officials regarding Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19).

The Queen Creek Unified School District Educational Services Department has developed a plan enabling students to continue the learning process in a meaningful way while prioritizing health and well-being.

a.aria-label: At-Home Educational Enrichment Resources/Activities news article

div.p: Check out these additional resources for COVID-19.
With the international emergency that we are currently navigating, I wanted to take a few moments to share my thoughts regarding this dilemma and update you on the QCUSD response to this situation.

div.p:
Average teacher salary notice per ARS 15-903(E)
$53,200 - average salary of all teachers employed in FY 2020 (budget year)
$50,667 - average salary of all teachers employed in FY 2019 (prior year)
$2,533 - increase in average teacher salary from prior year
5% - percentage increase
